Description:
Detects when an instance identity has taken an action that isn't inside SSM.
This can indicate that a compromised EC2 instance is being used as a pivot point.


Author: jamesc-grafana
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Malicious Usage Of IMDS Credentials Outside Of AWS Infrastructure
Query: sourcetype='aws-cloudtrail' eql select * from _source_ where (useridentity.arn re '.+:assumed-role/aws:.+' and  not (eventsource = 'ssm.amazonaws.com' and eventname = 'registermanagedinstance' and sourceipaddress = 'aws internal'))
